title: So a Circlejerk got Ahri up for a nerf
body: So finally, half the boards will be satisfied while the other half will be outraged. Thoughts?

replies.body:
i think you mean

"meddler realised that a champion needed nerf and ahri is being nerfed"

STOP
BELIEVING
THAT A VOCAL MINORITY
HAS AN IMPACT ON RIOT OPINION
Circlejerks are for things that aren't real.
It only took years for them to realize she needed a nerf. How riot games of them.

I'll be stuck in the middle lol. I hated laning her all the time but I'd still win easily and didn't think she actually needed nerfed. 

Her kit is just pure cancer, a nerf won't change that. We ALL hate those one or two times we get charmed lol.
More than half of this place is either indifferent or happy about Ahri nerfs.
honestly as a ahri main i have no problem with this, As long as charm exists ahri will always be relevant unless they absolutely gut her.
I'm one of the few that doesn't think she needs nerfs. I'm still confused by people's sudden uproar of the opinion that she needs nerfs.
its up to the data to have a champ nerfed and that data which is somewhere in the intranet ether of League Of Legends Co. is there for vetting.

The only thing I would want to change on her would be her early wave clear. At present, I think its a little to easy for ahri to go "Oh, I'm losing trades? Better just afk farm." She then proceeds to stay out of range and farm pretty well with q. Considering the positioning power her ult gives her, I would like a little more interactivity pre 6. Other than that shes fine.
